title: Illinois
prompt: A worn gravel county road stretching toward the horizon under soft golden late-afternoon light, with Illinois farmland rolling gently on both sidesâ€”silos and agricultural equipment visible in the distance. In the foreground, a hand rests on a weathered fence post, suggesting someone pausing to consider the landscape. The sky carries muted clouds, and the overall palette is warm ochre and faded greens, captured in a documentary style that emphasizes the scale and isolation of rural geography rather than romantic imagery. The composition conveys quiet acknowledgment of distance and resource scarcity.
